    Install ShakeCast on AWS Page ## ShakeCast Cloud Installation ShakeCast V3 is shipped primarily as a pre-packaged Linux system image. Among tested distributions, CentOS (open-source equivalent of the RedHat Enterprise Linux) is the default operating system (OS).
